line.token: * Credit to Guide: CodeIgniter RestApi tutorial <https://code.tutsplus.com/tutorials/working-with-restful-services-in-codeigniter--net-8814>
*This controller deals with the skills marketplace.
*The url and parameters will dictate which view is processed.
*The functions follow a similar pattern so have been commented where appropriate.
* @var $data Default common data required in all functions.
* The index function is called when accessing the inital page when you land on the marketplace view.
* Pagination is initialized,then a HTTP GET request is sent to the API to get all the skills
* with an $offset based on the url parameter in the third segment
* and a limit based on the number of skills per page.
* A JSON is returned from the API which is decoded and stored in an associative array
* @param int $offset Incremented by pagination, used to calculate which records to return from DB
* @todo 'total rows' to be assigned via api
//Get request sent to API , recieving JSON and decoding into an associative array
//noresults boolean records if skills were returned,so view can act accordingly
* The view function is called when accessing an individual skill on the marketplace.
* The call to the api has error supressed as if the api fails then a 404 error will not be displayed.
* Instead the view will display a user friendly error message if skill is empty
* @param int $skill_id The skill_id of the skill to be retrieved from the Skill table.
//If users has create skill prevent them from trading with themselves
//get the users skills to display in view for trading
//generate calendar params based on todays date.
* This function is called when the user searches for a term on the skills view.A http POST request
* contains the search term. The search term is set by the @method getSearchTerm().
* A JSON file is returned after a HTTP GET request is sent to the api with the searchterm ,
* offset and results per page.The JSON is decoded into an associative array which is passed to the view.
* @param int $offset Incremented by pagination, used to calculate which records to return from DB
* This function is called when the user clicks a category on the marketplace page(skill index view).
* The categories id is passed in the URI and HTTP GET request to the api returns
* all the skills which have a corrisponding category_id as a JSON which is converted to
* an associative array and passed onto the view.
* @param int $c_id Id of the category to get skills for.
* @param int $offset Incremented by pagination, used to calculate which records to return from DB
//validation failed a field empty or username exists
//reload the page with validation error msgs
* This function will send a HTTP get request to the api and will recieve a JSON response of all
* @return array An Associative array decoded from the JSON file returned by the api
